wellness-treatments.title: Signature Opduin Massage
wellness-treatments.description: Our signature full-body massage combines techniques from around the world with locally sourced sea salt and botanical oils from Texel. This 90-minute journey begins with a warm foot bath infused with Wadden Sea minerals, followed by a full-body massage using our custom blend of island herbs. Your therapist will work to release tension while promoting deep relaxation and renewed energy.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Our signature 90-minute full-body massage with local sea salt and botanical oils.
wellness-treatments.contraindications: Not recommended during first trimester of pregnancy or with acute inflammation.

wellness-treatments.title: Hot Stone Therapy
wellness-treatments.description: Warm volcanic basalt stones are placed on key energy points along your spine and body to release deep-seated muscle tension. Combined with flowing massage techniques, this treatment restores balance and promotes profound relaxation.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Volcanic stones therapy for deep muscle tension release.

wellness-treatments.title: Relaxation Massage
wellness-treatments.description: A classic Swedish massage focused on relaxation and stress relief. Using long, flowing strokes, your therapist will help you unwind and reconnect with your body.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Classic Swedish massage for ultimate relaxation.

wellness-treatments.title: Deep Tissue Massage
wellness-treatments.description: Intensive massage targeting chronic muscle tension and knots. Using slow, firm pressure, this treatment focuses on the deeper layers of muscle tissue to release built-up tension.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Intensive massage for chronic muscle tension.

wellness-treatments.title: Sea Mineral Facial (Women)
wellness-treatments.description: Harness the power of the Wadden Sea with this rejuvenating facial. Mineral-rich seaweed and sea clay work together to deeply cleanse, detoxify, and hydrate your skin. Includes a relaxing face, neck, and shoulder massage.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Rejuvenating facial with Wadden Sea minerals.

wellness-treatments.title: Anti-Aging Deluxe Facial
wellness-treatments.description: Our most comprehensive anti-aging treatment. Combining advanced peptides, vitamin C, and hyaluronic acid with specialized massage techniques to firm, lift, and rejuvenate mature skin.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Comprehensive anti-aging treatment with advanced peptides.

wellness-treatments.title: Gentlemen's Executive Facial
wellness-treatments.description: Specially designed for men's skin. Deep cleansing, exfoliation, and hydration tailored to address the specific needs of male skin, including post-shave care.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Deep cleansing facial designed specifically for men.

wellness-treatments.title: Texel Mud Wrap
wellness-treatments.description: Experience the healing properties of authentic Wadden Sea mud. This detoxifying body wrap uses mineral-rich mud sourced directly from the Texel shores to draw out impurities and nourish your skin.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Authentic Texel body wrap with local Wadden Sea mud.

wellness-treatments.title: Seaweed Salt Glow
wellness-treatments.description: A revitalizing body scrub using local sea salt and fresh seaweed extracts. Removes dead skin cells while infusing your skin with essential minerals from the Wadden Sea.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Revitalizing body scrub with local seaweed and sea salt.

wellness-treatments.title: Aromatic Body Treatment
wellness-treatments.description: Full-body exfoliation followed by a nourishing body wrap and moisturizing treatment. Choose from our signature aromatherapy blends.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Complete body treatment with exfoliation and wrap.

wellness-treatments.title: Luxe Manicure
wellness-treatments.description: A complete hand treatment including nail shaping, cuticle care, exfoliation, massage, and your choice of polish or natural finish.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Complete manicure with massage and polish.

wellness-treatments.title: Express Manicure
wellness-treatments.description: Quick polish and nail care for perfectly groomed hands when time is short.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Quick nail care and polish for busy schedules.

wellness-treatments.title: Luxe Pedicure
wellness-treatments.description: Comprehensive foot treatment including soak, exfoliation, nail care, callus treatment, and relaxing foot massage.

wellness-treatments.title: Full Leg Wax
wellness-treatments.description: Professional waxing service for smooth, hair-free legs.

wellness-treatments.title: Eyebrow Shaping
wellness-treatments.description: Expert eyebrow shaping to frame your face beautifully.

wellness-treatments.title: Kids Spa Experience
wellness-treatments.description: A gentle and fun spa experience designed especially for our younger guests. Includes a mini facial, hand treatment, and fun nail art.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Fun and gentle spa treatment for children.

wellness-treatments.title: Couples Retreat
wellness-treatments.description: Share the relaxation with your partner. Side-by-side massages in our private couples suite, including welcome champagne and chocolate truffles.
wellness-treatments.shortDescription: Side-by-side massages in our couples suite.

wellness-facilities.title: Indoor Swimming Pool
wellness-facilities.description: Our heated indoor pool offers stunning panoramic views across the Texel dunes. The 25-meter pool is maintained at a comfortable 28°C year-round. Sun loungers and towel service are provided. Perfect for morning laps or afternoon relaxation.
wellness-facilities.shortDescription: Heated 25m pool with panoramic dune views. Maintained at 28°C.
wellness-facilities.restrictions: Children under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

wellness-facilities.title: Finnish Sauna
wellness-facilities.description: Our traditional Finnish sauna is heated with authentic island timber, providing an authentic and rejuvenating heat therapy experience. Regular aufguss (infusion) sessions are offered by our wellness team.
wellness-facilities.shortDescription: Traditional Finnish sauna with authentic heat therapy.
wellness-facilities.restrictions: Not recommended for pregnant women or those with heart conditions.

wellness-facilities.title: Steam Bath
wellness-facilities.description: Our eucalyptus-infused steam bath provides gentle heat with 100% humidity. Excellent for respiratory wellness, skin cleansing, and deep relaxation. The chromotherapy lighting adds to the calming atmosphere.

wellness-facilities.title: Solarium
wellness-facilities.description: Professional high-pressure solarium for a beautiful, even tan. Modern equipment with built-in cooling system and timer control. Perfect for maintaining your glow before or after your Texel beach days.
wellness-facilities.shortDescription: Professional high-pressure tanning for a golden glow.
wellness-facilities.restrictions: Not suitable for those under 18 or with certain skin conditions.

wellness-testimonials.quote: The Signature Opduin Massage was absolutely divine. The therapist knew exactly where I held tension and worked miracles. I left feeling like a new person. The use of local sea salt and herbs made it truly unique.
The pool area with views over the dunes is magical. We spent hours there between treatments. The whole wellness experience was incredibly peaceful and restorative.
The Sea Mineral Facial left my skin glowing for weeks. The use of local Wadden Sea ingredients makes it truly unique. I've already booked my next appointment!
As someone who visits spas regularly across Europe, I can say Opduin Wellness stands out. The attention to detail, the quality of products, and the genuine care from staff is exceptional.
The Texel Mud Wrap was a unique experience. Knowing that the mud comes straight from the Wadden Sea made it even more special. My skin felt incredibly soft afterwards.
Perfect escape from busy city life. The sauna with aufguss sessions, followed by a dip in the cold plunge pool - exactly what I needed. Will definitely return.
